xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
authentication.admin.failureStrategy.label=Failure strategies authentication.admin.failureStrategy.hint=Strategies to use in case of multiple authentication failure. Multiple strategies can be selected. authentication.admin.failureStrategy.disableAccount.name=Disable account authentication.admin.failureStrategy.captcha.name=CAPTCHA authentication.admin.maxAttempts.label=Maximum number of authorized attempts authentication.admin.maxAttempts.hint=This represents the maximum number of authorized login failures before the strategy is activated. This number is taken into account only in the context of the following time window. Please consider that a 0 value means the feature is disabled. authentication.admin.timeWindow.label=Time window for login failures authentication.admin.timeWindow.hint=The time window in seconds during which to consider the failing login attempts for activating the strategy. authentication.admin.isAuthenticationSecurityEnabled.label=Enable or disable the authentication security mechanism authentication.admin.isAuthenticationSecurityEnabled.hint=Disabling the authentication security mechanism will also reset the authentication failure records. authentication.admin.isAuthenticationSecurityEnabled.disabled=Disabled authentication.admin.isAuthenticationSecurityEnabled.enabled=Enabled authentication.admin.heading=Authentication Security
security.authservice.admin.title=Authentication service security.authservice.admin.currentAuthService=Current Authentication service security.authservice.admin.component.label=Set authentication service: security.authservice.admin.component.save=Save security.authservice.admin.component.noService=No alternative authentication service can be found. security.authservice.admin.other.warning=The current authentication service cannot be modified because it's injected by a custom system. security.authservice.admin.class.warning=The current authentication service cannot be modified because it's controlled by the xwiki.cfg configuration file.
